name: Kamikaze Warlords (ALPHA MOVEMENT TEST)
description:
------------------------------------Planned Story----------------------------------------------------Two young Ninjas are hired by the US government to eliminate the Alien threat. The go by code names.  Rigor-Mortis and Hitman. The two young men are actually cousins.

----------------------------Controls------------------------------------------------------------------

Z - Cape strike

X - Cape toss

C - Jump

H - Restart

ESC - Exit game

Alt + Enter - Full screen

------------------------------------------Plans from here on------------------------------------------ Three selectable ninpos like in the Super Shinobi games.

- Additional character - More powerful but slightly slower

-------------------------------------------Addtional info---------------------------------------------

Donations are greatly admired.  Any amount helps.

A donation will let you into the dev discord to see the progress firsthand.
